summary: Join a voyage through aquatic realms where humans have rarely dared to go. Waddle with playful penguins, dart with lightning speed through schools of sharks, ride over stormy waves with massive whales and view rare alien-like creatures.
cast: Michael Gambon|David Attenborough|Pierce Brosnan|Frank Glaubrecht|Jacques Perrin|Dalik Wollinitz
title: Deep Blue: Un viaje a lo más profundo de los océanos
